00024 inline void vectorMinusEq( std::vector<double> &a, 
00025                           const std::vector<double> &b)
00026 {
00027    Require(a.size() == b.size());
00028 
00029    std::vector<double>::iterator aIter       = a.begin();
00030    std::vector<double>::const_iterator bIter = b.begin();
00031 
00032    while(aIter != a.end()) {
00033       // add value of bIter to aIter
00034       *aIter -= *bIter;
00035 
00036       ++aIter;
00037       ++bIter;
00038    }
00039 }
00040 
00042 inline void vectorPlusEq( std::vector<double> &a, 
00043                           const std::vector<double> &b)
00044 {
00045    Require(a.size() == b.size());
00046 
00047    std::vector<double>::iterator aIter       = a.begin();
00048    std::vector<double>::const_iterator bIter = b.begin();
00049 
00050    while(aIter != a.end()) {
00051       // add value of bIter to aIter
00052       *aIter += *bIter;
00053 
00054       ++aIter;
00055       ++bIter;
00056    }
00057 }

00060 inline double vectorDot( const std::vector<double> &a,
00061                          const std::vector<double> &b) {
00062    return std::inner_product(a.begin(), a.end(),
00063                                b.begin(), 0.0);
00064 }
00065 
00067 inline double vectorSum( const std::vector<double> &a) {
00068    return std::accumulate(a.begin(), a.end(), 0.0);
00069 }
00070 
00072 // square root of sum of squares
00073 inline double vectorNorm( const std::vector<double> &a) {
00074    double theSum = 0.0;
00075 
00076    std::vector<double>::const_iterator it = a.begin();
00077    while(it != a.end()) {
00078       theSum += (*it) * (*it);
00079       ++it;
00080    }
00081 
00082    return std::sqrt(theSum);
00083 }
00084 
00086 // square root of sum of differences squared
00087 inline double distance( const std::vector<double> &a,
00088                         const std::vector<double> &b) {
00089    Require(a.size() == b.size());
00090    double theSum = 0.0;
00091    double tempDiff;
00092 
00093    std::vector<double>::const_iterator itA = a.begin();
00094    std::vector<double>::const_iterator itB = b.begin();
00095    while(itA != a.end()) {
00096       tempDiff = *itA - *itB;
00097       theSum += tempDiff * tempDiff;
00098       ++itA;
00099       ++itB;
00100    }
00101 
00102    return std::sqrt(theSum);
00103 }
